name: Making Accessibility More Accessible for Your Organization
description:
How do you approach accessibility design in your day-to-day work? At Sonos, we strive to make the listening experience accessible to everyone. In this presentation, we'll share our journey as an Inclusive Design Group, a grassroots initiative led by UX designers and Researchers.


We will walk you through our approach to weaving accessibility principles into our workstream and daily design conversations. We will share a case study where research, engineering, and design partnered to better understand the mental model for screen readers, and how we leveraged this work to integrate design best practices into the Sonos design workflow.
